full_summary:
================================

**Rouge National Urban Park – Visitor, Learning and Community Centre - Phase 1**
================================================================================

**Invitation to Qualify (ITQ)**
-------------------------------

* **Reference Number**: WS3975361094-Doc3976154459
* **Publication Date**: April 21, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 25, 2023, 14:00 EDT
* **Amendment Date**: May 19, 2023 ( Refer to Amendment No. 5 for details)

**Project Overview**
-------------------

The Government of Canada, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), invites bids from qualified contractors for the construction of a Visitor, Learning and Community Centre at Rouge National Urban Park. The centre will provide educational and recreational facilities for visitors, as well as spaces for community events and activities.

**Key Details**
---------------

* **Contracting Entity**: PSPC (Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux)
* **End User**: Parks Canada Agency (Agence Parcs Canada)
* **Project Schedule**:
	+ Expected contract start date: July 10, 2023
	+ Project duration: TBA
* **Location**: Ontario (except the National Capital Region) 
* **Bid Overview**:
	+ Bid submission deadline: May 25, 2023, 14:00 EDT
	+ Late bids will not be accepted

**Notice URL**: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16067387?extsite=MTYwNjczODdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

**Contact Information**
----------------------

* Zobia Essa (SPAC/PSPC), zobia.essa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Important Notes**

* Amendment to closing time: Please disregard earlier posted deadline and online postings, all bid submissions must be submitted by 14:00 EDT on May 25, 2023.
* All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT on May 25, 2023 will be declared non-compliant.
